test_cases.name: TC-BQ1. Given party lookup is skipped and bulk quotes request is submitted, When receiver fsp fails the entire batch and sends the error, Then the PUT response should have error details about the transfer.

assertions.description: Check that the response has an error code of 4001
Check that the response has an error description of ID Not Found

test_cases.name: TC-BQ2. Given party lookup is skipped and bulk quotes request is submitted, When receiver fsp sends response after timeout while sending bulk quotes reponse, Then the PUT response should have error details about timeout.

assertions.description: Check response has quote result for first transfer
Check response has ilpPacket and condition for first transfer

test_cases.name: TC-BQ3. Given party lookup is skipped and bulk quotes request having 3 transfers with same receiver fsp id is submitted, When receiver fsp only sends response for 2 quotes out of the 3 while sending bulk quotes reponse, Then the PUT response should have error details about missing quote.

assertions.description: Check response has quote result for first transfer
Check response has ilpPacket and condition for first transfer
Check response has quote result for second transfer
Check response has ilpPacket and condition for second transfer

test_cases.name: TC-BQ4. Given there are 2 transfers in the bulk request and acceptParty is true for both the transfers, When the receiver fsp sends success response for first quote and failure for the second quote, Then the PUT response should have details of success and failure for both the quotes.

assertions.description: Check response has quote result for first transfer
Check response has ilpPacket and condition for first transfer

test_cases.name: TC-BQ5. Given there are 2 transfers in the bulk request, When the sender fsp sends the acceptParty:true for 1 transfer and acceptParty:false for the second transfer, Then the PUT response should have details of the 1 quote for which the acceptParty:true response was sent.

assertions.description: Check response has quote result for first transfer
Check response has ilpPacket and condition for first transfer

test_cases.name: TC-BQ6. Given there are 2 transfers in the bulk request, When the sender fsp sends  acceptParty:false for the both the quotes, Then the PUT response should have party details of the 2 transfers.

assertions.description: Check response has quote result for first transfer
Check response has ilpPacket and condition for first transfer

test_cases.name: TC-BQ7. Given there are 2 transfers in the bulk request, When the sender fsp sends  acceptParty:true for the one of the transfers and ignores the other, Then the PUT response should have party details of the 1 transfer for which the acceptParty response was sent.

assertions.description: Check response has quote result for first transfer
Check response has ilpPacket and condition for first transfer

test_cases.name: TC-BQ8. Given there are 2 transfers in the bulk request, When the sender fsp sends  acceptParty:false for the one of the transfers and ignores the other, Then the PUT response should have party details of the 1 transfer for which the acceptParty response was sent.

assertions.description: Check response has quote result for first transfer
Check response has ilpPacket and condition for first transfer

test_cases.name: TC-BQ9. Given there are 2 transfers in the bulk request with different receiver fsp ids, When one of the receivers sends an error, Then the PUT response should have details of the 2 transfers with success and failure details.

assertions.description: Check response has quote result for first transfer
Check response has ilpPacket and condition for first transfer
Check response has quote result for second transfer
Check response has ilpPacket and condition for second transfer

test_cases.name: TC-BQ10. Given there are 2 transfers in the bulk request, When the sender fsp sends the acceptParty:false for only 1 transfer and skips sending anything for the second transfer, Then the PUT response should not have details of any transfer.

assertions.description: Check response has quote result for first transfer
Check response has ilpPacket and condition for first transfer
Check response MSISDN is same as in the request
Check response has the receiver fspid populated
Check response has ilpPacket and condition
Check overall bulk transaction state is COMPLETED
